name: Merry Krampsmas
description:
Krampus has broken into Santa's workshop. He is wreaking havoc, and killing all the elves. Help fight back, or join Krampus and "sleigh" some elves.

My first game using Core. Things didn't go exactly as I had hoped, and I couldn't figure out how to implement a lot of the things I wanted to have in the game. So I hope at the very least you can enjoy the pretty environment.
